ygData.subject: Re: Prowl v Firestrike
ygData.msgSnippet: Firestrike was caught off guard by the sudden grab.  But not surprised of the bots strength.  Excellent he yelled, slurring the last part as he crippled over

Firestrike was caught off guard by the sudden grab.  But not 
surprised of the bots strength.  "Excellent" he yelled, slurring the 
last part as he crippled over under the blow.  He spun around with 
his sword fully extened at Prowl's head level to perform a 
tremendous roundhouse swing.
